events.title: Registration & Breakfast
events.description: Start your D4PG experience by checking in at the registration desk. Enjoy a light breakfast and connect with fellow attendees.

events.title: Welcome & Opening Remarks
events.description: Join D4PG's founder for an inspiring introduction to this year's conference theme: "Co-Powering an Emergent Horizon Part II: Reimagining Our Relationship with the Future."

events.title: Keynote: Reimagining Digital Justice Through Data Sovereignty
events.description: Dr. Kaler-Jones will explore how communities can reclaim ownership of their data and digital narratives, creating pathways toward more equitable futures in our increasingly data-driven society.

events.title: Morning Break
events.description: Refresh with coffee, tea, and light snacks while networking with other attendees.

events.title: Panel: Community-Based Approaches to Tech & Democracy
events.description: This panel will explore grassroots approaches to developing and deploying technology that centers community needs and strengthens democratic participation.

events.title: Lunch Break
events.description: Enjoy a catered lunch and network with peers, speakers, and facilitators.

events.title: Workshop: Data Privacy Tools for Community Advocates
events.description: This interactive workshop will introduce practical tools and strategies for community advocates to protect personal and collective data. Participants will learn how to conduct community data audits and create privacy protection plans.

events.title: Afternoon Break
events.description: Recharge with refreshments and connect with other attendees.

events.title: Panel: Afrofuturism and Digital Imagination
events.description: This panel explores how Afrofuturist perspectives can reshape our imagination around technology, culture, and social justice in digital spaces.

events.title: Welcome Reception
events.description: Join us for an evening of networking, light refreshments, and music. Meet speakers, panelists, and fellow attendees in a relaxed setting.
